meanings.definition: The act of officially suggesting someone for a position or award.
meanings.sent1: Her nomination for the award made her very happy.
meanings.sent2: The nomination of the new employee was well-deserved.
meanings.sent3: The nomination for the best cake baker caused a stir at the bake-off.
meanings.sent4: His nomination for team captain was like a spotlight on his leadership skills.
meanings.sent5: The nomination shone brightly among the other candidates.

meanings.definition: The state of being officially suggested for a position or award.
meanings.sent1: After the nomination, she eagerly awaited the final decision.
meanings.sent2: His nomination brought a sense of pride to the whole team.
meanings.sent3: The nomination for the top student seemed to make the others study harder.
meanings.sent4: Being in the nomination spotlight can be both exciting and nerve-wracking.
meanings.sent5: The nomination was like a golden ticket to success for him.
